title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 267.8 - Retention of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 267.8 - Retention of records

State Regulations

Except as provided for in section
267.4
of this Part, the books and records required to be kept by this Subchapter must
be retained so long as the contents thereof may become material in the
administration of article 30-B of the Tax Law and article X of the Codes and

Ordinances of the City of Yonkers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
267.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
